r.s: Map IP address to geographic places
r.d: This PHP extension allows you to find the location of an IP address - City, State, Country, Longitude, Latitude, and other information as all, such as ISP and connection type. For more info, please visit Maxmind's website.
r.n: * Added geoip_db_avail() to check for DB availability (file found) * Added geoip_db_filename() to get the internal file name of the library * Added geoip_db_get_all_info() to fetch all info about all database types * Added some tests so that make test can crunch something. * Added database file path and name in warning when DB is not found. * Added geoip.custom_directory php.ini option to change default path for DBs
